# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its quality and uniqueness, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its true value is $10,000. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
